alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Lycoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 4:26PM EDT until July 24 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Clinton County in north central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Lycoming County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 426 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Dunnstown, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Williamsport, Lock Haven, Jersey Shore, Mill Hall, Avis, Dunnstown, Flemington, Duboistown, Castanea, McElhattan, Cogan Station and Collomsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
